title: [Large-Scale] Analog Game-Based Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning theories and understanding of game elements
context.additional_context: Project-based activities where learners design and create analog games while applying language learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can create a board game reflecting target language grammar/vocabulary using a game design framework.
Learners can iteratively improve game prototypes at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners can explain three or more language learning strategies through the games they have created.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
